<font color="#FF1C1C">Demons</font> have triumphed because of indecisive <font color="#398EB6">Angels</font>!
Approve new team. You need %1$d votes.

Goal

Angels & Demons a game of strategy, measuring your ability to persuade others and to reveal lies. Players are divided into two teams of Angels and Demons. Angels are trying to please God by behaving when sent on earth and Demons are trying to displease him by committing sins on earth. After God is pleased 3 times, Angels win. When he\'s displeased 3 times, Demons win. Demons will also win if Angels are unable to organize team 5 times.

Setup

Enter number and names of the players into the game. After that pass the phone to each player so that they can see which team they are on - no other player can know that. Swipe your card to reaveal your role.

Gameplay

The game consists of two phases, creating team and team being send to earth to act

Creating team

Player that is currently on the turn chooses team from all team member. After that majority of player must agree on team composition.

Playing

Selected team is now send to earth. Phone is passed to everyone on a team and they cast a secret vote on what will they do. Angels have to help humans but Demons have choice to either help or to hurt them. If everyone on the team helped humans, Angels gain a point. If at least one (two in 4th round of 7+ players game) of the Demons hurt someone, they\'ll get a point.

Game Over

Game ends when one team has 3 points. Game can also end if Angels fail to construct team 5 times in a row, in such event Demons win.
